derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from French athlétique or Latin athleticus, from Greek athlētikos, from athlētēs (see athlete)

entry.tran: 运动的;体育的;运动员的
entry.def: Athletic means relating to athletes and athletics.

example.ex: They have been given college scholarships purely on athletic ability...
example.tran: 他们完全是凭体育特长才获得了大学奖学金。

example.ex: Most athletic activities are about individual effort.
example.tran: 大多数体育项目是靠个人的拼搏。

entry.def: An athletic person is fit, and able to perform energetic movements easily.

example.ex: Xandra is an athletic 36-year-old with a 21-year-old's body...
example.tran: 36岁的汉德拉身体健壮，有着21岁小伙子的体能。

example.ex: He was tall, with an athletic build.
